item.title: How to Learn Development
item.author: 谷中仁
item.description:
本文是近期为学弟学妹们演讲时用 Logseq 整理的大纲,在此记录一下，以备复用。

Intro

https://guzhongren.github.io/about/[1]

Know yourself

Do you really like computer science??? 灵魂三问，你真的喜欢计算机科学吗？如果不喜欢早点放弃，不然你以后的每一刻都会感到无比的痛苦。

Trend

Trend is the future https://www.devjobsscanner.com/blog/[2]

夫以铜为镜，可以正衣冠；以史为镜，可以知兴替；以人为镜，可以明得失。 《旧唐书·魏徵传》李世民 只有系统行地了解你所关注的内容的方向，你才能找到下一个发展的 G 点，从而成功。

Roadmap & Best Pratice

Roadmap

  • https://roadmap.sh[3]

Best Practice

  • Article

道术法器

  • 道：核心思想、理念、本质规律
  • 术：行为与技巧
  • 法：法律、规章、制度、方法
  • 器：工具

Frontend

Basic

  • Node[4]
    • https://nodejs.org/en/[4]
  • Package management
    • npm[5]
      • https://www.npmjs.com/[5]
    • yarn[6]
      • https://yarnpkg.com/[6]
    • pnpm[7]
      • https://pnpm.io/[7]
  • IDE
    • VSCode[8]
      • https://code.visualstudio.com/[8]
    • JetBrains[9]
      • https://www.jetbrains.com/[9]
  • Tools
    • Vite[10]
      • https://vitejs.dev/[10]
    • Webpack[11]
      • https://www.webpackjs.com/[11]
    • …

Language

  • JavaScript/TypeScript
  • CSS/Less/Sass
  • HTML

Framework

  • React[12]
    • https://reactjs.org/[12]
  • Vue[13]
    • https://vuejs.org/[13]
  • Angular[14]
    • https://angularjs.org/[14]
  • Svelte[15]
    • https://svelte.dev/[15]
  • …

Resources

  • 幕课网[16]
  • w3school[17]
  • MDN[18]

Backend

Nodejs

  • Express[19]
    • https://expressjs.com/[19]
  • Koa[20]
    • https://koajs.com/[20]

Java/Kotin

  • Spring[21]

GIS

ArcGIS[ESRI]

  • Dev docs[22]
    • https://developers.arcgis.com/documentation/mapping-apis-and-services/[22]
  • ArcGIS Desktop
  • ArcGIS Server

Supermap

OpenLayers[23]

https://openlayers.org/[23]

QGIS

GeoServer

Leaflet[24] https://leafletjs.com/[24]

Cesiumjs[25] https://cesium.com/platform/cesiumjs/[25]

Suggestions

Build common capabilities

  • Docker[26]
    • https://www.docker.com/[26]
  • Command line
    • https://github.com/microsoft/terminal[27]
    • Linux cmd
    • Mac iterm2 / Warp
  • Tech stacks
    • CI/CD
      • GitHub Actions[28]
        • https://docs.github.com/en/actions[28]
      • Jenkins[29]
        • https://www.jenkins.io/[29]
  • Soft skills
    • Communication
    • Management
    • Plan
    • Show
    • …

Build your Tech Radar

  • https://guzhongren.github.io/about/[1]

Always summary

  • Build your own blog website
  • Wechat articles
  • …

[[Agile]]

  • [[🌰 Template-Way-of-working]]
  • Tools
    • Calendar
    • Trello
    • …

Measure & track anything with data

  • [[💯 Capability Uplift]]

English

  • 四级/六级/PTE

Keep smile

  • Stop complaining;
  • Don’t complain;
  • No complaints.

Key Points

  • Quality vs Output
    • GitHub…
  • [[成事思维]]

Q&A
